name: Langrisser Tribute
overview: Langrisser Tribute (ラングリッサー トリビュート) is a Limited-Edition compilation set of Langrisser series for the Sega Saturn. It was only released in Japan. Langrisser is divided into Scenarios, each of which reveals a portion of the story through battle interaction. The series set itself apart from other tactical RPGs in its time with larger-scale battles, where the player can control over thirty units at one time and fight against scores of enemies.
